MORE_RATES_WIDGET_TITLE: Exchange {deposit} to {receive} with the Lowest Fees

SUBTITLE.FIRST: Exchange {deposit} {depositNetwork} to {receive} {receiveNetwork} effortlessly with our user-friendly interface, generous rates, and no sign up.
SUBTITLE.SECOND: Follow these 7 steps for a seamless transaction:

ITEMS.ITEM: Choose the desired crypto pair. Make sure that the exchange page has the cryptocurrencies you need.
Input the amount of {deposit} {depositNetwork}. Convert {deposit} {depositNetwork} to {receive} {receiveNetwork} to precise exchange amounts.
Compare the rates. Review offered conversion rates by different platforms.
Click on the exchange button. Start your {deposit} {depositNetwork} exchange.
Transfer your {deposit} {depositNetwork} to the given address.
Once the transaction is confirmed, you’ll get your XMR into your crypto wallet.

INFO.TEXT: RUDEX swap is a non-custodial instant crypto exchange aggregator that enables users to explore a global network of registered exchanges. It provides a comprehensive list of those that support specific trading or swap pairs.

Our platform ensures seamless crypto trading, offering users greater flexibility and a wide range of choices. With over 18 registered crypto exchanges and more than 1000 supported cryptocurrencies, RUDEX swap empowers users to make informed purchasing decisions based on various factors, including price, ratings, transaction speed, and more.
In short, RUDEX swap consolidates the best crypto trading opportunities into one place, helping you maximize your swaps and conversions.

RUDEX swap continuously monitors and compares some of the best cryptocurrency exchange rates across all available pairs. We obtain these real-time rates directly from our partnered exchanges, presenting them to you so you can make your swaps through your preferred platform.

Visiting each exchange individually to compare rates or creating user accounts can be time-consuming. Our instant crypto exchange service eliminates these hassles, providing you with optimal satisfaction and benefits.
After selecting the digital currencies you wish to swap, you'll receive offers from various exchanges, complete with their rates. You can choose based on the parameters provided in the offers.
RUDEX swap utilizes a variety of parameters and filters to compare rates and help you secure the best deals. Here are the key factors to consider when selecting an exchange on our platform:

ARRAY_ONE.TEXT: Types of Rates: Transactions typically take just a few minutes to process, during which cryptocurrency prices can fluctuate significantly. We provide two types of rates to help you navigate these changes:

ARRAY.TEXT: Fixed Rates: With this option, you’ll receive your swapped tokens at approximately the rate displayed when you clicked the ‘exchange’ button, regardless of any price fluctuations.
Floating Rates: This allows you to take advantage of price volatility. If the price moves in your favor during the waiting period, you’ll receive more coins than initially shown.

ARRAY_ONE.TEXT_CLOSE: However, if prices drop, you may end up with fewer coins. If you prefer to avoid risk, we recommend opting for the fixed rate.

ARRAY_TWO.TEXT: ETA (Estimated Time of Arrival): This indicates the approximate time it typically takes to complete a crypto exchange. If a fast transaction is your priority, choose an exchange with the lowest ETA.
Fees: RUDEX swap does not impose transaction fees; however, we include the exchange and network fees in the rates you see. Generally, exchanges with lower fees offer better deals.

Best Rate Tag: After compiling a list of exchanges supporting your swap pairs, we designate the one with the most favorable rate as the 'best rate.' If rates are your main concern, you may want to choose this exchange.

INFO.TEXT: As an instant crypto exchange aggregator, RUDEX allows you to swap cryptocurrencies without the need to create an account. Once you’ve chosen the cryptocurrencies you want to exchange, you can start and finish the process in as little as 5 minutes. For example, if you want to swap Bitcoin (BTC) for Litecoin (LTC), simply follow these steps:

ARRAY.TEXT: Select the BTC to LTC pair and enter the total amount of BTC you wish to exchange.
Compare the available rates to find the best BTC to LTC exchange deal, then click the exchange button on the right to proceed.
Enter the wallet address where you would like to receive your LTC.
Copy the generated Bitcoin address and send your BTC deposit.
RUDEX swap will process the transaction and notify you once it is successfully completed.

HELMET.TITLE: RUDEX swap - cryptocurrency exchange
HELMET.DESCRIPTION: RUDEX swap is an instant cryptocurrency exchange aggregator that allows you to easily swap over 1600 cryptocurrencies without registration. We offer competitive rates and reliable protection of your funds.
